thread.title: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons
thread.title_full: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons

title: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons
text: > Washington Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons FILE - In this June 2, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners manager Lloyd McClendon, left, yells as he talks with umpire Will Little after being ejected from the baseball game against the New York Yankees during the third inning, in Seattle. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season.(AP Photo/Elaine Thompson, File)
